Translations.Text: Ja libr de wicked est Sijjeen
Vi kon ki Sijjeen Do est
numerically struktur libr
Ve ke tag al rejectors
Ili ne kred en Tag Judgment
Neniom disbelieves therein transgressor des sinful
When our revelations recited him li dir Tales el preter
Ja their kor igx sxild their pek
Ja ili izol ke tag their Lord
Tiam ili jxet Infer
Ili told This est ki vi uz deny
Ja libr righteous vol est ‘Elleyyeen
Vi kon ki ‘Elleyyeen Do est
numerically struktur libr
Al witnessed those Me
righteous ind bliss
Sur luxurious furnishings ili watch
Vi recognize their vizagx joy bliss
Their drink spic nektar
Its spic est musk. This est ki competitors kondur por
Miks gxi est special flavors
Risort rezerv por those Me
wicked uz rid je those kred
When ili pas them ili uz poke fun
When ili got together their popol ili uz sxerc
Whenever ili seg them ili dir These popol est far astray
Ili ne hav such ajx (invisible) gard
Hodiaux those kred rid disbelievers
